metadata.Title: CVE-2013-6056 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: OSSIM before 4.3.3.1 has tele_compress.php path traversal vulnerability

notes.Note: seth-arnold> I'm not sure if this is actually the ossim that we have packaged, but I do not see a tele_compress.php file in our packages, so marking not-affected.

criterions.comment: ossim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
